145-148/365: Brighton

07.06.2011

We went to Brighton for a few days last week, and got lots of photos, some of which I'm quite pleased with.

Those are some of my favourites from each day, for one reason or another. I'll post some more from Brighton shortly, but I've got a bit of processing to do first.
